snippet: One of the highly regarded veterans of tournament bridge, Russ Arnold of Miami, died on Jan. 27 at 90 after a prolonged battle with prostate cancer and kidney failure.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played in 1981 by Russ Arnold, who recently died.
lead_paragraph: One of the highly regarded veterans of tournament bridge, Russ Arnold of Miami, died on Jan. 27 at 90 after a prolonged battle with prostate cancer and kidney failure.

headline.seo: Russ Arnold’s Defense at Bermuda Bowl Semifinal - Bridge
headline.main: Remembering Deft Defense of a Hall of Fame Champion
headline.print_headline: Remembering Deft Defense Of a Hall of Fame Champion
